If you find your self in a rough spot feel free to contact one of our online staff members by typing ::help
You can earn many useful rewards from completing our achievements
You can view our monsters many drops by clicking the red icon in the quest tab
Donating helps keep the server alive, visit our ::store today
You can quickly join our discord by either using the quest tab Quick Links section, or by using ::discord
You can find the rules by simply typing ::rules
You can check out our youtube channel by using the Quick Links section of the quest tab
You can secure your account by activating your bank pin!
You can find a list of our commands at ::commands
